text:
Nezasa | Full-Stack Software Engineer | Full-Time | Lisbon | On-Site

Nezasa is a travel technology startup with offices in Zurich and Lisbon. We are creating a product that lets the user fully customize their individual travel packages and eventually book them -- all on one platform.

Our stack: Scala (play, akka), EmberJS, Memcached, MongoDB, Elasticsearch

More info about the positions can be found on our website: https://www.nezasa.com/jobs/
